SensorManager

Class SensorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • SensorManager.SensorListener
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EEGSensorListener, GSRSensorListener, HeartRateSensorListener

    public abstract class SensorListener
extends java.lang.Object

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private boolean connectionStatus
      Tells if the connection is established.
      private int freq
      Frequency of the sensor (Hz)
      private java.util.ArrayList<SensorObserver> observerCollection
      Stores all the observers that registered to observe the changes of the status of this sensor
      private int portNumber
      Port number of the sensor
      private byte[] sensorData
      Raw data of the sensor.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SensorListener() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract boolean connect()
      Tries to connect with the sensor
      abstract boolean disconnect()
      Disconnects the sensor from Emotion Engine
      abstract int getFrequency()
      Frequency of the sensors in Hz.
      abstract int getPortNumber()
      Port number of the sensor
      abstract byte[] getSensorData()
      Gives the current sensor data as bytes
      abstract boolean isConnected()
      States if Emotion Engine is currently connected to a sensor
      protected abstract void notifyObservers()
      When a data arrives, a connection is established, or the sensor is disconnected, observers are notified.
      abstract boolean registerObserver(SensorObserver observer)
      Registers the observer to observe the changes of this sensor
      abstract boolean removeObserver(SensorObserver observer)
      Removes the observer so that it won't be notified for any change of this sensor

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • portNumber

        private int portNumber
        Port number of the sensor

      • connectionStatus

        private boolean connectionStatus
        Tells if the connection is established. True: Connection established False: Connection is not established

      • observerCollection

        private java.util.ArrayList<SensorObserver> observerCollection
        Stores all the observers that registered to observe the changes of the status of this sensor

      • sensorData

        private byte[] sensorData
        Raw data of the sensor. As this data changes, observers are notified.

      • freq

        private int freq
        Frequency of the sensor (Hz)

        Tries to connect with the sensor
        Returns:
        true if the connection is established

        public abstract boolean disconnect()
        Disconnects the sensor from Emotion Engine
        Returns:
        true if the disconnection is successful

      • getSensorData

        public abstract byte[] getSensorData()
        Gives the current sensor data as bytes
        Returns:
        the raw data of the sensor

      • getFrequency

        public abstract int getFrequency()
        Frequency of the sensors in Hz.
        Returns:
        the numerical value of the frequency in Hz.

      • getPortNumber

        public abstract int getPortNumber()
        Port number of the sensor
        Returns:
        the numerical value of the port number of the sensor

      • isConnected

        public abstract boolean isConnected()
        States if Emotion Engine is currently connected to a sensor
        Returns:

      • notifyObservers

        protected abstract void notifyObservers()
        When a data arrives, a connection is established, or the sensor is disconnected, observers are notified.

      • registerObserver

        public abstract boolean registerObserver(SensorObserver observer)
        Registers the observer to observe the changes of this sensor
        Parameters:
        observer - is registered to be notified
        Returns:

      • removeObserver

        public abstract boolean removeObserver(SensorObserver observer)
        Removes the observer so that it won't be notified for any change of this sensor
        Parameters:
        observer - is removed from observers list of this sensor.
        Returns:
